todo.description: Build the full-viewport card-stack scroll interaction per specs-v2/card-stack-scroll.md — pin a section (Engineering Log or Work Experience) and stack cards on scroll, with reduced-motion fallback and mobile-disabled behavior.

todo.title: Implement Name & Avatar Hover Reveal
todo.description: Add cursor-proximity reveal effect to the hero avatar and name — a circular mask around the cursor exposes the GitHub identity (Vonshlovens + GitHub PFP) underneath the display identity, with soft feathered edge, mobile-disabled, and reduced-motion fallback.

todo.title: Implement Animation Toggle
todo.description: Add a nav-bar toggle that disables all page animations and transitions. Respects prefers-reduced-motion as default, persists to localStorage, applies a global CSS override via data-reduce-motion attribute, and exposes a Svelte store for JS-driven animations.

todo.title: Add Resume PDF Download
todo.description: Serve a static resume PDF from static/resume.pdf. Update the hero primary CTA to link to the resume (opens in new tab with download fallback). Optionally add a 'Download Full Resume' link in the work experience section.

todo.title: Implement Scroll-Triggered Entrance Animations
todo.description: Build a reusable Svelte action (use:scrollReveal) using Intersection Observer to fade-up sections and stagger grid children on scroll. Respects animation toggle and prefers-reduced-motion. CSS-only transitions on opacity/transform for performance.

todo.title: Integrate Live GitHub Stats
todo.description: Fetch live data from the GitHub API via +page.server.ts to populate the hero stat cards and terminal panel with real repo count, commit count, and account age. Includes static fallbacks and optional GITHUB_TOKEN for higher rate limits.

todo.title: Implement Accessibility Standards
todo.description: Add skip-to-content link, focus-visible indicators, ARIA attributes, keyboard trap for mobile menu, and verify WCAG AA color contrast across all sections. Run Lighthouse/axe-core audits per specs-v2/accessibility.md.

todo.title: Add Dark/Light Theme Toggle
todo.description: Add a nav-bar theme toggle with a warm parchment light mode alongside the existing dark theme. Includes Svelte store, localStorage persistence, prefers-color-scheme detection, FOUC-prevention script, and light-mode CSS custom properties.

todo.title: Apply Performance Optimizations
todo.description: Enable static prerendering, configure image lazy loading and WebP formats, add font preconnect/preload, set caching headers for Deno Deploy, and validate against Lighthouse 90+ target per specs-v2/performance.md.
